mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transporter_request(transfer_request_id, transporter_id, from_shelter_name, to_shelter_name, message) VALUES(#{transferRequestId}, #{transporterId}, #{fromShelterName}, #{toShelterName}, #{message});
mapper.select: SELECT tp.id, tp.store_name, tp.tel, tp.addr, (6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS( #{fromShelterLatitude})) * COS(RADIANS(tp.latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(tp.longitude) - RADIANS( #{toShelterLongitude})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{fromShelterLatitude})) * SIN(RADIANS(tp.latitude)) )) AS distance FROM transporter tp WHERE tp.longitude != #{toShelterLongitude} ORDER BY distance LIMIT 10;
